name: servicem8
description: ServiceM8 helps field service businesses schedule jobs, send quotes, and manage invoices, offering staff mobile apps and real-time job status tracking

tools.name: SERVICEM8_CREATE_JOB_NOTE
tools.description: Tool to create a new job note in ServiceM8. Use when you need to attach additional information to a specific job after obtaining its UUID.

inputSchema.title: CreateJobNoteRequest

uuid.title: Uuid
uuid.description: Unique identifier for this note record. If omitted, a UUID will be generated.

create_date.title: Create Date
create_date.description: Timestamp when record was last modified (ISO 8601). Server overrides if omitted.

related_object.title: Related Object
related_object.description: Type of the related object. Use 'job' for job notes.

action_completed_by_staff_uuid.title: Action Completed By Staff Uuid
action_completed_by_staff_uuid.description: UUID of staff member who completed the required action.

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a new ServiceM8 Job Note.

tools.name: SERVICEM8_CREATE_JOB_PAYMENT
tools.description: Tool to create a new job payment in ServiceM8. Use when you have collected payment details and need to record payment against a job. Example: "Create a 100.00 cash payment for job 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000 at 2023-01-01 13:00:00."

inputSchema.title: CreateJobPaymentRequest

uuid.title: Uuid
uuid.description: Optional unique identifier for the job payment.

active.title: Active
active.description: 1 if the payment is active; 0 if archived.

edit_date.title: Edit Date
edit_date.description: Timestamp of last edit in 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS' format.

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: Timestamp of the payment in 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS' format.

is_deposit.title: Is Deposit
is_deposit.description: 1 if this payment is a deposit; 0 otherwise.

attachment_uuid.title: Attachment Uuid
attachment_uuid.description: UUID of any attachment related to the payment.

actioned_by_uuid.title: Actioned By Uuid
actioned_by_uuid.description: UUID of the staff member who actioned the payment.

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a new ServiceM8 Job Payment.

tools.name: SERVICEM8_CREATE_JOBS
tools.description: Tool to create a new Job in ServiceM8. Use when you have gathered all job details and need to push a record. Example: "Create a Quote job for 123 Main St with PO #1234."

inputSchema.title: CreateJobsRequest

date.title: Date
date.description: Date the job is scheduled or created (YYYY-MM-DD).

active.title: Active
active.description: Active flag (1 = active, 0 = deleted). Defaults to 1.

badges.title: Badges
badges.description: List of badge UUIDs to apply (comma-separated).

status.title: Status
status.description: Current status of the job. Controls dispatch board placement.

queue_uuid.title: Queue Uuid
queue_uuid.description: UUID of the queue to assign this job to.

job_address.title: Job Address
job_address.description: Physical address where the job is to be performed.

company_uuid.title: Company Uuid
company_uuid.description: UUID of the customer/company associated with this job.

job_description.title: Job Description
job_description.description: Brief description of the work to be done.

created_by_staff_uuid.title: Created By Staff Uuid
created_by_staff_uuid.description: UUID of the staff member creating this job.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for creating a new Job in ServiceM8.

tools.name: SERVICEM8_DELETE_JOB_NOTE
tools.description: Tool to delete a specific job note. Use when you need to archive a note by its UUID.

inputSchema.title: ServiceM8DeleteJobNoteRequest

uuid.title: Uuid
uuid.description: UUID of the job note to delete. Example: '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'

inputSchema.description: Request model for deleting a specific ServiceM8 job note.

tools.name: SERVICEM8_DELETE_JOB_PAYMENT
tools.description: Tool to delete (archive) a specific job payment by its UUID. Use when you need to archive a payment record.

inputSchema.title: DeleteJobPaymentRequest

uuid.title: Uuid
uuid.description: The UUID of the job payment to delete (archive).

inputSchema.description: Request model for deleting (archiving) a ServiceM8 Job Payment by UUID.

tools.name: SERVICEM8_LIST_ALL_ASSETS
tools.description: Tool to list all ServiceM8 assets. Use when you need a comprehensive asset registry, including custom fields, for inventory or reporting.

inputSchema.title: ListAllAssetsRequest

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: Filter expression to narrow down assets; use ServiceM8 filtering syntax, e.g., 'active eq 1'.

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing all ServiceM8 assets. Supports optional filtering.

tools.name: SERVICEM8_LIST_ALL_CLIENTS
tools.description: Tool to list all ServiceM8 clients. Use when you need a complete set of customer records for integrations or reporting.

inputSchema.title: ListAllClientsRequest

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: Filter expression to narrow down clients; use ServiceM8 filtering syntax, e.g., 'active eq true'.

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing all ServiceM8 clients. Supports optional filtering.

tools.name: SERVICEM8_LIST_ALL_DOCUMENT_TEMPLATES
tools.description: Tool to list document templates. Use when you need to retrieve available template UUIDs and names before generating job documents.

inputSchema.title: ListAllDocumentTemplatesRequest

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of templates to return (must be ≥1).

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: Filter expression to narrow document templates; use ServiceM8 filtering syntax, e.g., 'name eq "Invoice"'.

offset.title: Offset
offset.description: Number of templates to skip before returning results (must be ≥0).

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing document templates. Supports optional filtering and pagination.

tools.name: SERVICEM8_LIST_ALL_FORMS
tools.description: Tool to list all ServiceM8 forms. Use when you need to fetch available form templates with optional filters.

inputSchema.title: ListAllFormsRequest

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: Filter expression to narrow down forms; use ServiceM8 filtering syntax, e.g., 'active eq true'.

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing all ServiceM8 forms. Supports optional filtering.

tools.name: SERVICEM8_LIST_ALL_JOB_NOTES
tools.description: Tool to list all job notes in ServiceM8. Use when you need to fetch notes, optionally filtered or paginated.

inputSchema.title: ListAllJobNotesRequest

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of notes to return (must be >=1).

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: ServiceM8 OData filter expression; only one filter per request.

offset.title: Offset
offset.description: Number of notes to skip (must be >=0).

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing all job notes. Supports optional filtering and pagination.

tools.name: SERVICEM8_LIST_ALL_JOB_QUEUES
tools.description: Tool to list all job queues in ServiceM8. Use when you need to fetch configured queues before dispatching jobs.

inputSchema.title: ListAllJobQueuesRequest
inputSchema.description: Request model for listing all ServiceM8 job queues.

tools.name: SERVICEM8_LIST_ALL_JOBS
tools.description: Tool to list all jobs. Use when you need to fetch all job records from your ServiceM8 account.

inputSchema.title: ListAllJobsRequest

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: Filter criteria to narrow down jobs. Use ServiceM8 filtering syntax, e.g. "status='Completed'".

inputSchema.description: Query parameters for listing ServiceM8 jobs.

tools.name: SERVICEM8_LIST_ALL_LOCATIONS
tools.description: Tool to list all ServiceM8 locations. Use when you need to fetch every configured location for assignments or mapping.

inputSchema.title: ListAllLocationsRequest
inputSchema.description: Request model for listing all ServiceM8 locations. No parameters supported.

tools.name: SERVICEM8_LIST_ALL_MATERIALS
tools.description: Tool to list all materials. Use when you need a full inventory dump after authenticating with read_inventory scope.

inputSchema.title: ListAllMaterialsRequest
inputSchema.description: Request model for listing all materials. No query parameters supported.

tools.name: SERVICEM8_LIST_ALL_TASKS
tools.description: Tool to list all tasks in a ServiceM8 account. Use when you need to fetch task records, optionally filtered. Requires 'read_tasks' OAuth scope.

inputSchema.title: ListAllTasksRequest

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of tasks to return (must be ≥1).

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: Filter expression to narrow task results; use OData syntax, e.g., "completed eq false".

offset.title: Offset
offset.description: Number of tasks to skip (must be ≥0).

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing all tasks. Supports optional filtering and pagination.

tools.name: SERVICEM8_RETRIEVE_CLIENT
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific client by its UUID. Use after confirming the client's UUID is valid.

inputSchema.title: RetrieveClientRequest

uuid.title: Uuid
uuid.description: UUID of the company (client) to retrieve

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a specific ServiceM8 client.

tools.name: SERVICEM8_RETRIEVE_FORM
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific form by its UUID. Use when you need up-to-date form metadata given a known form UUID.

inputSchema.title: RetrieveFormRequest

uuid.title: Uuid
uuid.description: The unique identifier (UUID) of the form to retrieve.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a specific ServiceM8 form by UUID.

tools.name: SERVICEM8_RETRIEVE_JOB
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific job by its UUID. Use when you have the Job UUID and need its full record.

inputSchema.title: RetrieveJobRequest

uuid.title: Uuid
uuid.description: The UUID of the job to retrieve

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a ServiceM8 Job by UUID.

tools.name: SERVICEM8_RETRIEVE_JOB_ACTIVITY
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific job activity by its UUID. Use when you have the job activity UUID and need its full details.

inputSchema.title: RetrieveJobActivityRequest

uuid.title: Uuid
uuid.description: UUID of the ServiceM8 job activity to retrieve

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a specific ServiceM8 job activity by UUID.

tools.name: SERVICEM8_RETRIEVE_JOB_NOTE
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific job note by its UUID. Use when you have the note UUID (e.g., after listing notes) and need its full record before processing or display.

inputSchema.title: RetrieveJobNoteRequest

uuid.title: Uuid
uuid.description: UUID of the job note to retrieve.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a ServiceM8 job note by its UUID.

tools.name: SERVICEM8_RETRIEVE_JOB_PAYMENT
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific job payment by its UUID. Use when you have the payment UUID and need its full record and metadata.

inputSchema.title: RetrieveJobPaymentRequest

uuid.title: Uuid
uuid.description: The UUID of the job payment to retrieve.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a ServiceM8 Job Payment by UUID.

tools.name: SERVICEM8_RETRIEVE_JOB_QUEUE
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific job queue by its UUID. Use when you need full queue metadata before dispatching work.

inputSchema.title: RetrieveJobQueueRequest

uuid.title: Uuid
uuid.description: UUID of the job queue to retrieve.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a ServiceM8 job queue by UUID.

tools.name: SERVICEM8_RETRIEVE_LOCATION
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific location by its UUID. Use when you already have the location's UUID and need full location details.

inputSchema.title: RetrieveLocationRequest

uuid.title: Uuid
uuid.description: UUID of the ServiceM8 location to retrieve.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a ServiceM8 location by UUID.

tools.name: SERVICEM8_RETRIEVE_MATERIAL
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific material by its UUID. Use when you have a material UUID and need current inventory or pricing details.

inputSchema.title: RetrieveMaterialRequest

uuid.title: Uuid
uuid.description: UUID of the material to retrieve

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a specific ServiceM8 material.

tools.name: SERVICEM8_RETRIEVE_STAFF_MEMBER
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific staff member by their UUID. Use when you need up-to-date staff information given a known staff UUID.

inputSchema.title: RetrieveStaffMemberRequest

uuid.title: Uuid
uuid.description: The unique identifier (UUID) of the staff member to retrieve.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for retrieving a specific staff member.

tools.name: SERVICEM8_SERVICE_M8_CREATE_JOB
tools.description: Tool to create a new job in ServiceM8. Use when you have all job details and need to push a record into ServiceM8. Example: "Create a Quote job for 123 Main St with PO #1234."

inputSchema.title: ServiceM8CreateJobRequest

date.title: Date
date.description: Date the job is scheduled or created (YYYY-MM-DD).

badges.title: Badges
badges.description: List of badge UUIDs to apply (visual indicators on dispatch board).

status.title: Status
status.description: Current status of the job (controls dispatch board placement).

queue_uuid.title: Queue Uuid
queue_uuid.description: UUID of the queue to assign this job to.

job_address.title: Job Address
job_address.description: Physical address where the job is to be performed.

company_uuid.title: Company Uuid
company_uuid.description: UUID of the customer/company associated with this job.

category_uuid.title: Category Uuid
category_uuid.description: UUID of the job category (e.g., Plumbing, Electrical).

job_description.title: Job Description
job_description.description: Brief description of the work to be done.

created_by_staff_uuid.title: Created By Staff Uuid
created_by_staff_uuid.description: UUID of the staff member creating this job.

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a new ServiceM8 Job.

tools.name: SERVICEM8_UPDATE_JOB_NOTE
tools.description: Tool to update details of an existing job note. Use when modifying a note after its creation.

inputSchema.title: UpdateJobNoteRequest

note.title: Note
examples: Rescheduled to next Tuesday at 10 AM.
note.description: New content for the job note

uuid.title: Uuid
uuid.description: UUID of the job note to update

edit_date.title: Edit Date
edit_date.description: Timestamp when the note was last edited in 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS' format

inputSchema.description: Request model for updating a ServiceM8 job note. Provide the note UUID and at least one field to modify.

tools.name: SERVICEM8_UPDATE_JOB_PAYMENT
tools.description: Tool to update details of an existing job payment. Use after confirming the payment UUID and desired changes.

inputSchema.title: UpdateJobPaymentRequest

uuid.title: Uuid
uuid.description: UUID of the job payment to update

edit_date.title: Edit Date
edit_date.description: Last edited timestamp in 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS' format

attachment_uuid.title: Attachment Uuid
attachment_uuid.description: UUID of an attachment related to the payment

actioned_by_uuid.title: Actioned By Uuid
actioned_by_uuid.description: UUID of the staff member who actioned the payment

inputSchema.description: Request model for updating a ServiceM8 job payment record. Provide the UUID of the payment and any fields to update.
